ai-patthana16.18:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.18:0.3_0: preceding a wholesome mind, and associated with the mental associated states,
ai-patthana16.18:1.1_0: a skillful thought associated with mind, no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.18:1.1_1: a skillful thought associated with mind, no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.18:1.1_2: A skillful thought associated with mind, and a good principle not associated with the mind. ...
ai-patthana16.18:1.1_3: a skillful thought with the mind is not associated with mind, nor are their causes and associated with the mind.
ai-patthana16.18:1.1_4: skillful qualities arise or associated with mind.
ai-patthana16.18:2.1_0: Unskillful thought arises in the mind and not associated with the mind. ...
ai-patthana16.18:3.1_0: Not thoughts associated with mind, no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.18:3.1_1: Not thoughts associated with mind, no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.18:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana16.18:5.1_0: When the mind is quite secluded from unprofitable things ...
